languages.text: "Неужели твоя вера в Бога-Машину настолько слаба, что ты готов позволить скверне ксенотеха покоиться в твоем теле наравне с Истинной плотью?"

traits.locale_text: "Неужели твоя вера в Бога-Машину настолько слаба, что ты готов позволить скверне ксенотеха покоиться в твоем теле наравне с истинной плотью?"

languages.text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
languages.original_text: "Неужели твоя вера в Бога-Машину настолько слаба, что ты готов позволить скверне ксенотеха покоиться в твоем теле наравне с Истинной плотью?"

traits.locale_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to take in the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
"Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to take in the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
"Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble, you would allow your body to take in the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
"Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble, you would allow your body to take in the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
"Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"
"Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

languages.text: 「自分の肉体に真の肉体や異星技術の汚れを宿すことを許すほど、機械神への信仰は弱いのか？」
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: 「自分の肉体に真の肉体や異星技術の汚れを宿すことを許すほど、機械神への信仰は弱いのか？」

languages.text: “你对万机之神的信仰真的这么软弱吗？你真的打算让你的身体与实肉一起沾染异形科技的玷污吗？”
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: “你对万机之神的信仰真的这么软弱吗？你真的打算让你的身体与实肉一起沾染异形科技的玷污吗？”

languages.text: «¿Tan débil es su fe en el Dios Máquina que permite que su cuerpo aloje la corrupción de la xenotecnología junto a la Verdadera Carne?».
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tan débil es su fe en el Dios Máquina que permite que su cuerpo absorba la corrupción de la xenotecnología junto a la Verdadera Carne?».

languages.text: "Ist Euer Glaube an den Maschinengott derart schwach, dass Ihr den Makel von Xenotech in Eurem Körper dulden würdet, neben dem Wahren Fleisch?"
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist Euer Glaube an den Maschinengott derart schwach, dass Ihr den Makel von Xenotech in Eurem Körper gestatten würdet, neben dem Wahren Fleisch?"

languages.text: « Votre foi envers le Dieu-Machine serait-elle si faible que vous permettriez à la corruption de la xénotechnologie de côtoyer votre chair véritable ? »
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre foi envers le Dieu-Machine serait-elle si faible que vous permettriez à la souillure de la xénotech de côtoyer votre chair véritable ? »

languages.text: "Makine Tanrı'ya olan inancın, vücudunda Salt Suret'in yanında zeno teknolojisi lekelerini taşımaya göz yumacak kadar zayıf mı?"
languages.original_text: "Is your faith in the Machine God so feeble that you would allow your body to harbour the taint of xenotech alongside the True Flesh?"

traits.locale_text: "Makine Tanrı'ya olan inancın, vücudunda Salt Suret'inin yanında zeno teknolojisinin lekesini taşımaya göz yumacağın kadar zayıf mı?"
